headline: Can Emission Reduction Initiatives Drive Growth for NRG Stock?
summary: NRG Energy has taken initiatives to cut emissions and aims to achieve net-zero emission levels by 2050.

headline: Duke Energy thanks customers for help managing the power grid through hot temperatures
summary: As summer's first heat wave brought triple-digit temperatures to parts of North Carolina and South Carolina this week, Duke Energy thanks customers for conserving energy during periods of peak demand.

raw.headline: Duke Energy thanks customers for help managing the power grid through hot temperatures
raw.summary: As summer's first heat wave brought triple-digit temperatures to parts of North Carolina and South Carolina this week, Duke Energy thanks customers for conserving energy during periods of peak demand.

headline: CEG vs. DUK: Which Nuclear-Powered Utility Is Worth Your Investment?
summary: Both CEG and DUK are U.S. utility operators with significant nuclear assets, providing baseload power and reliable services.

raw.headline: CEG vs. DUK: Which Nuclear-Powered Utility Is Worth Your Investment?

headline: Duke Energy says summer power usage record of 35,269 MWh set on Tuesday
summary: Duke Energy said on Thursdaythat it had set a preliminary new combined utility system summerusage record of 35,269 megawatt hours on Tuesday. The company said that the new record...
